Lionshare Farm – A 95 Acre Equestrian Estate In Greenwich, CT

May 13, 2017

LOCATION: 404 Taconic Road, Greenwich, CT

SQUARE FOOTAGE: N/A

BEDROOMS & BATHROOMS: 1 bedroom & 5 bathrooms

PRICE: $39,000,000

This 95 acre equestrian estate, dubbed “Lionshare Farm”, is located at 404 Taconic Road in Greenwich, CT. It is owned by Olympic medalist Peter Leone. 

The 36-stall show barn was built in 1997 and features an upper level trophy room/lounge, 115 ft X 240 ft indoor riding ring, office/bedroom with a full bath and staff quarters for six

Other features include 14 spacious grass paddocks, a jumping derby field, 2 outdoor riding rings, an aerated pond, the original 34 stall polo barn, cottages and second indoor riding ring.

It is listed at $39,000,000.
